data: When it became noised about that Frank Reade, Jr., the distinguished inventor, was about to make a trip to the far West with his wonderful Steam Horse, public interest became greatly excited.

Frank Reade, Jr., with his new steam horse in the great American desert
or, The sandy trail of death
